title: B-Town Celebrates Festivities, Vicky Kaushal's 'How's The Josh' Now A Dish And More From Ent
text:
October is a month of back-to-back festivals in India. From Dusshera to Karwa Chauth and Diwali, everyone is in full spirits and ready to celebrate. Even after staying miles away from India, our very own 'Desi Girl' Priyanka Chopra is still connected to her roots. Priyanka, who is currently on the Jonas Brothers tour, celebrated her very first Karwa Chauth.

Actor Vicky Kaushal took to Instagram to share how there's a restaurant that serves a dish named 'How's the Josh'. Sharing picture the menu, Kaushal wrote, “It’s a dish now!” The dish that Vicky wrote about is a mutton dish prepared with spices and saffron and served with jeera naan.

Don't Miss 103 SHARES 1.1 K SHARES 25.5 K SHARES

Everyone initially thought of him as one of the strongest contestants in the Bigg Boss house but his temper issues seem to be tarnishing that image. The public, other housemates, and now even his former co-stars don't seem too convinced. Those who have been regularly watching the show will agree.

She said, “Cinema has the power to make us less lonely when we are. In the age of digital streaming and social media that is slowly but surely is isolating us, the Mumbai Academy of Moving Images (MAMI) binds us without boundaries, inhibitions and most importantly without fear. As an artist who truly believes in the power of cinema, I say we need this more than ever before.”

Expect some more fireworks as the first wild card entrant in Bigg Boss 13 is Punjabi singer Himanshi Khurana. She appeared in Punjabi movie Sadda Haq and gained instant fame but her history with current Bigg Boss contestant Shehnaz is what is going to make her entry a little more interesting.
